list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getBitemporalTimestampsByIndex
list.description: Given the index of a node, find the bitemporal timestamps that that link to it (with the properties AbstractFeatureWithLifespan.validFrom and AbstractFeatureWithLifespan.validTo) and return them as an object of Dates

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getScenarioLayerNameByIndex
list.description: Given the index of a node (of type Version or VersionTransition) and a layerManager, find the first Scenario that links to it and return the first layer that matches the layer.name of the Scenario's localname.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getScenarioLayerNameByUri
list.description: Given the uri of a node (of type Version or VersionTransition) and a layerManager, find the first Scenario that links to it and return the first layer that matches the layer.name of the Scenario's localname.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getVersionScenarioByIndex
list.description: Given the index of a node (of type Version), return the node of the first Scenario links to it using Scenario.versionMember.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getVersionScenarioByUri
list.description: Given the uri of a node, return the node of the first Scenario links to it using Scenario.versionMember. The uri should belong to a node of type Version.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getVersionTransitionScenarioByIndex
list.description: Given the index of a node (of type VersionTransition), return the node of the first Scenario links to it using Scenario.versionTransitionMember.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#getVersionTransitionScenarioByUri
list.description: Given the uri of a node, return the node of the first Scenario links to it using Scenario.versionTransitionMember. The uri should belong to a node of type VersionTransition.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow#transactionChainQuery
list.description: Get the CityGML 3.0 transaction chain query for as a string
